categories: Category:Star Wars: Force Commander voice actors

nodes.text: David Hattersly Warner (born July 29, 1941) is an English actor who provided the voice for Grand General Malcor Brashin in Star Wars: Force Commander.

He is perhaps best known to science fiction fans for appearing in two separate films and a two part episode of the Star Trek franchise: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier, Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country and the Star Trek: The Next Generation Season Six episodes "Chain of Command, Parts I and II".

He has also made several appearances in Doctor Who media, most notably as an alternate Third Doctor in Doctor Who in the stories Sympathy for the Devil (2003) and Masters of War (2008). He's also appeared in other Doctor Who stories, Circular Time (2007) and Empathy Games (2008). Also appearing in the Doctor Who spin-off series Bernice Summerfield in the story The Adventure of the Diogenes Damsel (2008).
